# Day 18 - Advent of Code

You can find the link for day 18, 2022 [here](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/18). This folder will provide complete solutions for part 1 and part 2 of day 18.

NOTE: This code was used from Reddit User [RadioactiveHop](https://topaz.github.io/paste/#). (I did not have time today)

## Setup

To run this code, you should get the input from [this link](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/18/input) and paste it into `droplet-data.txt` but my input is already provided as a sample. You should also make sure to have Python installed (I use Python 3.10.7 but it should work with most versions).

# Run The Code

```bash
python3 boiling-boulders.py
```
